snippet: The standings say the New York Rangers and Pittsburgh Penguins are tied atop the hyper competitive Metropolitan Division. On the ice at the moment, there appears to be plenty of separation....
lead_paragraph: The standings say the New York Rangers and Pittsburgh Penguins are tied atop the hyper competitive Metropolitan Division. On the ice at the moment, there appears to be plenty of separation.

headline.main: Crosby Scores NHL-High 22nd Goal, Penguins Drop Rangers 7-2
headline.print_headline: Crosby Scores NHL-High 22nd Goal, Penguins Drop Rangers 7-2
